channel.title: Making clients compatible with servers?
channel.description:
I have a PI, and I'm trying to make it compatible with a certain client (377 deob) so it can have an old gameframe.
Unfortunately, it never successfully connects. I thought it was do to it not having the correct files, so I copied my classes from one client to the new one (377 deob) and compiled. It still didn't work. Any ideas?
Or could you give me a client (with the old 377 gameframe) that is compatible with PI?
-Thanks.

item.title: Making clients compatible with servers?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

The 317 and 377 protocol are different in opcodes. You’re going to have to find a documentation for the 377 protocol or figure out the opcodes yourself. I sort of doubt you’re using a 377 client, however. Most ‘377 clients’ out there are just 317 client that utilize the 377 cache.

Read full topic
